e21-CO227-PeraMorphiq.title: PeraMorphiq
e21-CO227-PeraMorphiq.description: Group 17 - Full-stack web platform for neuromorphic research management with Node.js, MongoDB, JWT auth, and admin dashboard at University of Peradeniya.

e21-CO227-Peraverse-integration.title: Peraverse integration
e21-CO227-Peraverse-integration.description: Integration, Testing and Deployment of the Peraverse crowd management system which was developed to manage the crowd during the Engex 2025

e21-co227-Crowd-Balance-Mobile-App.title: Crowd Balance Mobile App
e21-co227-Crowd-Balance-Mobile-App.description: Smart exhibition management mobile app for EngEx 2025 offering real-time crowd balancing, missing person notifications, car park tracking, and AI chatbot support. Powered by React Native, MongoDB, Express.js and Node.js for optimal performance.

e21-co227-Event-Management-System.title: Event Management System
e21-co227-Event-Management-System.description: Users browse event listings and receive personalized recommendations based on saved interests. They can manage interests to refine suggestions. Admins authenticate to an admin dashboard to review and control which events appear to users. It can serve as a starter for community calendars, campus activities, or internal company events.

e21-co227-EventStack-Event-Management-Sy.title: EventStack Event Management System
e21-co227-EventStack-Event-Management-Sy.description: A complete event management platform with event discovery, organizer tools, expense dashboards, and admin controls - powered by React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL.

e21-co227-ExpoEvent-Task1-C-Bookmark-and.title: ExpoEvent Task1 C Bookmark and Notification System
e21-co227-ExpoEvent-Task1-C-Bookmark-and.description: A web application enabling users to bookmark events at exhibitions and receive timely notifications about their saved events. Users can easily manage their interests by selecting specific exhibitions or activities, ensuring they never miss important happenings through automated reminders and personalized alerts.

e21-co227-PeraVerse-Event-Details-Page.title: PeraVerse Event Details Page
e21-co227-PeraVerse-Event-Details-Page.description: Single Event Details page of the PeraVerse Exhibition Management System

e21-co227-PeraVerse-Event-List-Page.title: PeraVerse Event List Page
e21-co227-PeraVerse-Event-List-Page.description: A full-stack Event Management Dashboard where users can browse events, filter by category,  mark attendance, rate events, and leave comments.

e21-co227-PeraVerse-Organizer-Dashboard-.title: PeraVerse Organizer Dashboard Core Backend
e21-co227-PeraVerse-Organizer-Dashboard-.description: Full-stack Organizer Dashboard ( Core Backend ) for the 75Exhibition system, combining a modern web UI with microservices for Auth, Event, Alert, Building, and Organizer Management

e21-co227-Peraverse.title: Peraverse
e21-co227-Peraverse.description: Integration, Testing and Deployment of the Peraverse crowd management system which was developed to manage the crowd during the Engex 2025 URL-

e21-co227-QR-AI-Entry-Exit-Tracking-Syst.title: QR AI Entry Exit Tracking System
e21-co227-QR-AI-Entry-Exit-Tracking-Syst.description: Smart Occupancy Management System — a cloud-based platform for real-time building occupancy tracking. It evolved from a QR-based app to an automated system using Supabase for data updates and monitoring.

e21-co227-RFID-Hardware-and-Tag-Lifecycl.title: RFID Hardware and Tag Lifecycle
e21-co227-RFID-Hardware-and-Tag-Lifecycl.description: A complete RFID-based visitor tracking and engagement system for EngEx 2025. Powered by LF RFID + ESP-01 hardware, MQTT messaging, a Node.js backend, PostgreSQL database, and React dashboards, it delivers live analytics, scoring, and robust multi-booth tracking under heavy event traffic.

e21-co227-Smart-Crowd-Monitoring-System-.title: Smart Crowd Monitoring System Using Yolo And Deepsort
e21-co227-Smart-Crowd-Monitoring-System-.description: This system counts people across multiple cameras using YOLOv8 and DeepSort, saves the data to PostgreSQL, and offers live monitoring through a FastAPI backend and React frontend.
